text: mere rab! tune mujhe raajy pradaan kiya aur mujhe ghatanaon aur baaton ke nishkarsh tak pahunchana sikhaaya. aakaash aur dharatee ke paida karanevaale! duniya aur aakhirat mein too hee mera sanrakshak mitr hai. too mujhe is dasha se utha ki main muslim (aagyaakaaree) hoon aur mujhe achchhe logon ke saath mila.
